00107 - (NSMutableDictionary *) headers {
00108     if (nil == headers_) {
00109         headers_ = [NSMutableDictionary dictionary];
00110     }
00111     return headers_;
00112 }
00113 
00114 @dynamic mergedHeaders;
00115 - (NSMutableDictionary *) mergedHeaders {
00116         NSMutableDictionary *mergedHeaders = [NSMutableDictionary dictionary];
00117         
00118         [mergedHeaders addEntriesFromDictionary:parent_.mergedHeaders];
00119         
00120         [mergedHeaders addEntriesFromDictionary:headers_];
00121         return mergedHeaders;
00122 }
00123 
00124 - (NSTimeInterval) timeout {
00125         if (timeout_ == 0 && parent_.timeout > 0) {
00126                 return parent_.timeout;
00127         }
00128         return timeout_;
00129 }
00130 
00131 - (NSURLRequestCachePolicy) cachePolicy {
00132         if (cachePolicy_ == NSURLRequestUseProtocolCachePolicy && parent_.cachePolicy != NSURLRequestUseProtocolCachePolicy) {
00133                 return parent_.cachePolicy;
00134         }
00135         return cachePolicy_;
00136 }
00137 
00138 - (id<RCAuthProvider>) authProvider {
00139         if (nil == authProvider_ && parent_.authProvider) {
00140                 return parent_.authProvider;
00141         }
00142         if (nil == authProvider_ && username_.length && password_.length) {
00143                 authProvider_ = [RCBasicAuthProvider withUsername:username_ password:password_];
00144         }
00145         return authProvider_;
00146 }
00147 
00148 - (RESTClientContentType) contentType {
00149         if (contentType_ == RESTClientContentTypeNone && parent_.contentType > RESTClientContentTypeNone) {
00150                 return parent_.contentType;
00151         }
00152         return contentType_;
00153 }
00154 
00155 - (void) setContentType:(RESTClientContentType)contentType {
00156     if (contentType_ != contentType) {
00157         contentType_ = contentType;  
00158         [self setHeadersForContentType:contentType_];
00159     }
00160 }
00161 
00162 - (RCPreflightBlock) preflightBlock {
00163         if (nil == preflightBlock_ && parent_.preflightBlock != nil) {
00164                 return parent_.preflightBlock;
00165         }
00166         return preflightBlock_;
00167 }
00168 
00169 - (RCPostProcessorBlock) postProcessorBlock {
00170         if (nil == postprocessorBlock_ && parent_.postProcessorBlock != nil) {
00171                 return parent_.postProcessorBlock;
00172         }
00173         return postprocessorBlock_;
00174 }
00175 
00176 @dynamic requests;
00177 - (NSMutableSet *) requests {
00178         dispatch_semaphore_wait(requests_semaphore_, DISPATCH_TIME_FOREVER);
00179         NSMutableSet *requests = [NSMutableSet setWithSet:self.requests_];
00180         dispatch_semaphore_signal(requests_semaphore_);
00181         return requests;
00182 }

00193 - (void)dealloc {
00194         dispatch_release(requests_semaphore_);

00196 
00197 + (id) withURL:(NSString *)URLString {
00198         return [[RCResource alloc] initWithURL:URLString];
00199 }
00200 
00201 - (id) initWithURL:(NSString *)URLString {
00202         self = [super init];
00203         if (self) {
00204                 self.URL = [NSURL URLWithString:URLString];
00205                 if (URL_ == nil) {
00206                         self = nil;
00207                         return self;
00208                 }
00209                 self.cachePolicy = NSURLRequestUseProtocolCachePolicy;
00210                 requests_ = [NSMutableSet new];
00211                 
00212                 requests_semaphore_ = dispatch_semaphore_create(1);
00213         }
00214         return self;
00215 }
00216 
00217 - (NSString *) description {
00218         return [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@: %@",[super description],[self.URL absoluteURL]];
00219 }

00224 #pragma mark - Resource
00225 
00226 
00227 
00228 - (RCResource *) resource:(id)relativePathObject {
00229         NSAssert(URL_ != nil,@"Cannot construct a resource without a base URL!");
00230         
00231         NSString *relativePath;
00232         if ([relativePath isKindOfClass:[NSString class]]) {
00233                 relativePath = relativePathObject;
00234         } else {
00235                 relativePath = [relativePathObject description];
00236         }
00237         
00238         //rdar: 10487909, must remove preceding slash because URLByAppendingPathComponent is adding one incorrectly
00239         relativePath = [relativePath stringByTrimmingCharactersInSet:[NSCharacterSet characterSetWithCharactersInString:@"/"]];
00240         
00241         NSURL *resourceURL = [URL_ URLByAppendingPathComponent:relativePath];
00242         resourceURL = [resourceURL standardizedURL];
00243         
00244         RCResource *resource = [RCResource withURL:[resourceURL absoluteString]];
00245         
00246         resource.parent = self;
00247         
00248         return resource;
00249 }
00250 
00251 - (RCResource *) resourceWithFormat:(NSString *)relativePathFormat,... {
00252         va_list args;
00253         va_start(args,relativePathFormat);
00254         NSString *relativePath = [[NSString alloc] initWithFormat:relativePathFormat arguments:args];
00255         va_end(args);        
00256 
00257         return [self resource:relativePath];
00258 }

00273 
00274 #pragma mark - Request Control
00275 
00276 - (void) cancelRequests {
00277         [self cancelRequestsWithBlock:nil];
00278 }
00279 
00280 - (void) cancelRequestsWithBlock:(void (^)(void))block {
00281         dispatch_queue_t request_queue = dispatch_get_global_queue(DISPATCH_QUEUE_PRIORITY_DEFAULT, 0);
00282 
00283         dispatch_async(request_queue, ^{
00284                 dispatch_semaphore_wait(requests_semaphore_, DISPATCH_TIME_FOREVER);
00285 
00286                 for (RCRequest *request in self.requests_) {                    
00287                         [request cancel];
00288                 }
00289                 [self.requests_ removeAllObjects];
00290 
00291                 dispatch_semaphore_signal(requests_semaphore_);
00292 
00293                 if (block) {
00294                         dispatch_async(dispatch_get_main_queue(), block);
00295                 }
00296         });
00297 }

00310         RCRequest *request = [self requestForHTTPMethod:kRESTClientHTTPMethodGET];

00318 - (void) getWithProgressBlock:(RCProgressBlock)progressBlock completionBlock:(RCCompletionBlock)completionBlock {
00319         RCRequest *request = [self requestForHTTPMethod:kRESTClientHTTPMethodGET];
00320         request.didReceiveDataBlock = progressBlock;
00321         [self runRequest:request withCompletionBlock:completionBlock];

00408 - (void) uploadFile:(NSURL *)fileURL withProgressBlock:(RCProgressBlock)progressBlock completionBlock:(RCCompletionBlock)completionBlock {
00409         RCRequest *request = [self uploadRequestWithFileURL:fileURL];
00410         request.didSendDataBlock = progressBlock;
00411         [self runRequest:request withCompletionBlock:completionBlock];

00422 - (RCRequest *) requestForHTTPMethod:(NSString *)method {
00423         NSMutableURLRequest *URLRequest = [self URLRequestForHTTPMethod:method];
00424         RCRequest *request = [[RCRequest alloc] initWithURLRequest:URLRequest];
00425         [self configureRequest:request];
00426         return request;
00427 }
00428 
00429 - (RCDownloadRequest *) downloadRequest {
00430         NSMutableURLRequest *URLRequest = [self URLRequestForHTTPMethod:kRESTClientHTTPMethodGET];
00431         RCDownloadRequest *request = [[RCDownloadRequest alloc] initWithURLRequest:URLRequest];
00432         [self configureRequest:request];
00433         return request;
00434 }
00435 
00436 - (RCUploadRequest *) uploadRequestWithFileURL:(NSURL *)fileURL {
00437         NSMutableURLRequest *URLRequest = [self URLRequestForHTTPMethod:kRESTClientHTTPMethodPUT];
00438         RCUploadRequest *request = [[RCUploadRequest alloc] initWithURLRequest:URLRequest];
00439         [self configureRequest:request];
00440         request.fileToUploadURL = fileURL;
00441         return request;
00442 }

00449 #pragma mark - Request Helpers
00450 
00451 
00452 - (void) setHeadersForContentType:(RESTClientContentType)contentType {
00453         switch (contentType) {
00454                 case RESTClientContentTypeJSON:
00455                         [self.headers setObject:@"application/json" forKey:@"Content-Type"];
00456                         [self.headers setObject:@"application/json" forKey:@"Accept"];
00457                         break;
00458                 case RESTClientContentTypeXML:
00459                         [self.headers setObject:@"application/xml" forKey:@"Content-Type"];
00460                         [self.headers setObject:@"application/xml" forKey:@"Accept"];
00461                         break;
00462                 case RESTClientContentTypeHTML:
00463                         [self.headers setObject:@"text/html" forKey:@"Content-Type"];
00464                         [self.headers setObject:@"text/html" forKey:@"Accept"];
00465                         break;                  
00466                 default:
00467                         break;
00468         }
00469 }
00470 
00471 - (NSMutableURLRequest *) URLRequestForHTTPMethod:(NSString *)method {
00472         NSMutableURLRequest *URLRequest = [[NSMutableURLRequest alloc] initWithURL:self.URL];
00473         [URLRequest setHTTPMethod:method];
00474         [URLRequest setAllHTTPHeaderFields:self.mergedHeaders];
00475         
00476         return URLRequest;
00477 }
00478 
00479 - (void) configureRequest:(RCRequest *)request {
00480         request.timeout = self.timeout;
00481         request.authProvider = self.authProvider;
00482         request.postProcessorBlock = self.postProcessorBlock;
00483         request.cachePolicy = self.cachePolicy;
00484 }

00487 // ========================================================================== //
00488 
00489 #pragma mark - Request Runners
00490 
00491 
00492 
00493 - (RCResponse *) runBlockingRequest:(RCRequest *)request {      
00494         dispatch_semaphore_t request_sema = dispatch_semaphore_create(1);
00495     __block RCResponse *localResponse = nil;
00496         
00497         RCCompletionBlock completionBlock = ^(RCResponse *response){
00498                 localResponse = response;
00499                 dispatch_semaphore_signal(request_sema);
00500         };
00501         
00502         RCAbortBlock abortBlock = ^(RCRequest *request) {
00503                 dispatch_semaphore_signal(request_sema);
00504         };
00505 
00506         dispatch_semaphore_wait(request_sema, DISPATCH_TIME_FOREVER);
00507         [self runRequest:request withCompletionBlock:completionBlock abortBlock:abortBlock];
00508 
00509         dispatch_semaphore_wait(request_sema, DISPATCH_TIME_FOREVER);
00510         dispatch_semaphore_signal(request_sema);
00511         dispatch_release(request_sema);
00512     return localResponse;
00513 }
00514 
00515 - (void) runRequest:(RCRequest *)request withCompletionBlock:(RCCompletionBlock)completionBlock {
00516         [self runRequest:request withCompletionBlock:completionBlock abortBlock:NULL];
00517 }
00518 
00519 - (void) runRequest:(RCRequest *)request withCompletionBlock:(RCCompletionBlock)completionBlock abortBlock:(RCAbortBlock)abortBlock {
00520         if (self.preflightBlock) {
00521                 dispatch_async(dispatch_get_main_queue(), ^{
00522                         if(self.preflightBlock(request)) {
00523                                 [self dispatchRequest:request withCompletionBlock:completionBlock];
00524                         } else {
00525                                 [request abortWithBlock:abortBlock];
00526                         }
00527                 });
00528         } else {
00529                 [self dispatchRequest:request withCompletionBlock:completionBlock];
00530         }
00531 }
00532 
00533 - (void) dispatchRequest:(RCRequest *)request withCompletionBlock:(RCCompletionBlock)completionBlock {
00534         dispatch_queue_t request_queue = dispatch_get_global_queue(DISPATCH_QUEUE_PRIORITY_DEFAULT, 0);
00535         dispatch_async(request_queue, ^{
00536                 [self addRequest:request];
00537                 [request startWithCompletionBlock:^(RCResponse *response){
00538                         if (completionBlock) {
00539                                 completionBlock(response);
00540                         }
00541                         dispatch_async(request_queue, ^{
00542                                 [self removeRequest:request];
00543                         });
00544                 }];
00545         });
00546 }
00547 
00548 - (void) addRequest:(RCRequest *)request {
00549         dispatch_semaphore_wait(requests_semaphore_, DISPATCH_TIME_FOREVER);
00550         [self.requests_ addObject:request];
00551         dispatch_semaphore_signal(requests_semaphore_);
00552 }
00553 
00554 - (void) removeRequest:(RCRequest *)request {
00555         dispatch_semaphore_wait(requests_semaphore_, DISPATCH_TIME_FOREVER);
00556         [self.requests_ removeObject:request];
00557         dispatch_semaphore_signal(requests_semaphore_);
00558 }
